title: As a User, I want to Navigate to and View the Employee Roster Widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions for the Employees Widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user is in Rosters Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN Employees Tab should be located under Rosters Dashboard
AND Employees" tab should be placed in alphabetical order on the dashboard and sub-menu
AND Browser tab text should say "Employees" 
AND Will match the provided wire and data discovery
AND Default Sort is Alpha by Employee Name
AND Employee Name column will be a hyperlink to the employee's profile

Wireframe:
http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=roster

**Note:** Clicking on "Rosters" in the left nav should continue loading the MJ/MN Rosters tab by default

title: As a User, I want there to be a Phone Number section on an Employee Profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is in Employee Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user opens an employee profile
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a Phone Number section on the employee profile - located in Contact Info when in View Mode.  In Edit Mode, the Phone Number section will display.
AND the section will match the provided wireframe and data discovery
AND the section will be editable in edit mode
AND Phone numbers may be added and deleted
AND this section will work the same way it does on player profiles

Wire:
http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=employee_profile

title: As a User, I want there to be an Email section on an Employee Profile

custom_expected:

AND the section will match the provided wireframe and data discovery
AND the section will be editable in edit mode
AND Emails may be added and deleted
AND This section will work the same way it does on player profiles

http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=employee_profile

title: As a User, I want to Edit an Employee Profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is in Employee Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user opens an employee profile
custom_expected:
THEN an Edit(grey) button will be available anytime the form is in view mode if the viewing user has edit permissions for the form in its current state. 
AND Clicking  Edit will reload the form in edit mode, and a Save(grey) button will appear in place of the Edit button (no edit button displayed in edit mode).
AND Editable fields will match what is in the provided Data Discovery (Note the special behaviors)

Wire:
http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=employee_profile

title: As a User, I want to view an Employee Profile for a former Domestic Amateur Player
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is in Employee Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user opens an employee profile who was a former Domestic Amateur Player
custom_expected:
THEN Clicking the employees name in the Employees widget will load the employees profile
AND Browser tab text should say "Profile - [Last Name], [Roster First]"
AND the profile will match the provided data discovery and wire-  If an employee was a former player, use player profile and the employee profile header
AND these players include anyone who had previously been entered as a domestic amateur player
AND These profiles should include the History, Info, Contracts, and Draft & Scouting tabs

Wire:
http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=employee_profile_-_past_player

title: As a User, I want to Save an Employee Profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is in Employee Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user opens an employee profile in Edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN A Save button will be available anytime the form is in edit mode. 
AND Clicking Save will save the profile and it's current values and reload the profile in view mode. 
AND Required field and format checks will be made on Save.
AND After a successful save the system will display a successful save blue notification. See Messages #77.
AND Whenever the form is in edit mode, the user will see a "Cancel" button on the form in grey.

Wire:
http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=employee_profile

title: As a User, I want to perform an Advanced Search for Employees
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is advanced search
custom_steps: WHEN user perform an advanced search for Employees
custom_expected:
THEN "Employees" will be an option under "Search Type" (alpha)
AND Filters and result columns will match provided documentation

title: As a user I want to see the Create New icon on an employee profile if I have create permissions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has permission to the following:
  - MJ Contract Admin
  - MN Contract Admin
  - Employee Transactions Admin
custom_steps: WHEN user is in Employee Profile
custom_expected:
THEN user should see a Create New icon on an Employee Profile: 
Or If they do not have any of these permissions, then they do not see the create new icon on an employee profile.

title: As a user I do not want to see "Employee Transactions" as an option if I don't have create permissions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to create a new Employee Transaction for an Employee
AND logged in user does NOT have Create Permissions for Employee Transactions
(Does not have the following:
- MJ Contract Admin
- MN Contract Admin
- Employee Transactions Admin)
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Employee Profile
custom_expected:
THEN the user should NOT see the "Transactions" option in the employee create new menu
BUT if the user DOES have the permissions listed above, then the use SHOULD see the "Transactions" option in the Employee Create New menu

title: As a User, I want changes made to Employees to be reflected in reports and widgets
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is attempting to view anything in the system that relates to Employee profiles (Reports, widgets, rosters etc)
custom_steps: WHEN user views any of these items
custom_expected: THEN recent updates to employee profiles implemented in EBIS2 will be reflected

title: As a User, I want to Cancel an Employee Profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is in Employee Widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens an employee profile in Edit mode
AND user clicks on Cancel button
custom_expected:
THEN Clicking "Cancel" will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to cancel the changes they have made. 
AND If they confirm the cancellation and the form has not yet been saved in the system, then the form should be closed and no record should be kept. User should be returned to their entry point. 
AND If they confirm the cancellation and the profile has been previously saved in the system, then the profile should be reloaded in view mode, with none of the edits that were made since the last save and up to the cancellation point reflected.
AND If they do not confirm the cancellation then the user will be returned to the form and no action will be taken.

Wire:
http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=employee_profile

title: As a User, I want to see an Employee Profile for a former Professional Player
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is in Employee Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user opens an employee profile who was a former player
custom_expected:
THEN Clicking the employees name in the Employees widget will load the employees profile
AND Browser tab text should say "Profile - [Last Name], [Roster First]"
AND The profile will match the provided data discovery and wire-  If an employee was a former player, use player profile and the employee profile header
AND These players include anyone that has signed a player contract at some point
AND All appropriate player profile tabs should be present (History, Info, Contracts, Waivers & Trans, International, Draft & Scouting, Service, Stats)

Wire:
http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=employee_profile_-_past_player

title: As a User, I want the system to calculate the Employee-centric fields
custom_preconds:
Wire:
http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=employee_profile
Date Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Employee+Profile+Header
GIVEN a user is attempting to Create a new Employee Profile
OR user is viewing an existing Employee Profile
custom_steps: WHEN user views the Employee Profile Header section
custom_expected:
THEN the system should calculate and populate the following fields on the employee profile:
   -- Contract Years
   -- Years with Club
   -- Years in Position
AND these fields should be match the wirerame

title: As a user I want to be able to quicksearch for Employees
custom_steps:
Search Requirements:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Quick+Search+Population+rules

Acceptance Criteria:

In the Quick Search dropdown there is an option for "Employees"
This should display first since the list is alphabetical, but the default should remain Professional Players.
Selecting "Employees" should allow the user to quickly search for Employees by entering in text per the requirements.
The population returned should be limited to employees that are currently active (Active or Active, Not Under Contract) or have been active within the past 2 years (determined by last transaction date).
The population should be ordered according to the search requirements.

title: As a User, I want to see a Employee Bio Update reflected in the Player History
custom_steps:
Wire:
http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=employee_profile

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Employee+Profile+Header

Acceptance Criteria:

A line appears in the history of employees for the Bio Update of select fields.
This story should include the ETL from 1 of any pre-existing history items.
A line is added to a player's history when any of the following fields are updated:
DOB
Roster Name
First Name
Middle
Last
Extended Last
Any field within the National ID section
The Code = Employee Profile, the Date = date update is made, Description should be "Bio update by username. "

title: As a user I want to see the Create New icon on an employee profile if I have create permissions (Part 2)
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* If a user has any of the following permissions, then they should see a Create New icon on an Employee Profile: 

  - MJ Contract Admin
  - MN Contract Admin
  - Employee Transactions Admin
 - Employee Contracts Admin
     - BOC UEC Admin
     - Club Field Personnel UEC Admin
     - Club Scouting UEC Admin
     - Club Executives UEC Admin
     - Club Front Office UEC Admin

* If they do not have any of these permissions, then they do not see the create new icon on an employee profile.
* If the user has any of the Employee Contracts Admin permissions, they should see Employee Contracts as an option for a professional profile.

title: As a user I want to see the Create New icon on an international amateur player profile if I have employee create permissions (Part 2)
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* If a user has any of the following permissions, then they should see a Create New icon on a Professional Player Profile: 

  - MJ Contract Admin
  - MN Contract Admin
  - MN Transactions Admin
  - Employee Transactions Admin
  - Employee Contracts Admin
     - BOC UEC Admin
     - Club Field Personnel UEC Admin
     - Club Scouting UEC Admin
     - Club Executives UEC Admin
     - Club Front Office UEC Admin
  - Investigations Admin

* If they do not have any of these permissions, then they do not see the create new icon on a professional player profile.
* If the user has any of the Employee Contracts Admin permissions, they should see Employee Contracts as an option for a professional profile.

title: As a user I want to see the Create New icon on a domestic amateur player profile if I have employee create permissions (Part 2)
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* If a user has any of the following permissions, then they should see a Create New icon on a Domestic Amateur Player Profile: 

  - MJ Contract Admin
  - MN Contract Admin
  - MN Transactions Admin
  - Employee Transactions Admin
   - Employee Contracts Admin
     - BOC UEC Admin
     - Club Field Personnel UEC Admin
     - Club Scouting UEC Admin
     - Club Executives UEC Admin
     - Club Front Office UEC Admin
  - Investigations Admin

* If they do not have any of these permissions, then they do not see the create new icon on a professional player profile.
*  If the user has any of the Employee Contracts Admin permissions, they should see Employee Contracts as an option for a professional profile.

title: As a user I want to see the Create New icon on a professional player profile if I have employee create permissions (Part 2)
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* If a user has any of the following permissions, then they should see a Create New icon on a Professional Player Profile: 

  - MJ Contract Admin
  - MN Contract Admin
  - MN Transactions Admin
  - MJ Transactions Admin
  - Employee Transactions Admin
  - Employee Contracts Admin
     - BOC UEC Admin
     - Club Field Personnel UEC Admin
     - Club Scouting UEC Admin
     - Club Executives UEC Admin
     - Club Front Office UEC Admin

  - Investigations Admin
   
* If they do not have any of these permissions, then they do not see the create new icon on a professional player profile.
* If the user has any of the Employee Contracts Admin permissions, they should see Employee Contracts as an option for a professional profile.

title: As a user I want the approval of an assign/reassign transaction to convert a domestic amateur player into an employee, if relevant
custom_steps:
See Approval Updates: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=120636039

Employee Profile Wires: 
http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=employee_profile_-_past_player

Acceptance Criteria:
* If the assign/reassign employee transaction is being done via a domestic amateur player profile, the approval of this transaction should convert the player into an employee.  
* The employee should have a Scouting/Drafts tab as well as Info, History, Contract History.

title: As a user I want the approval of an assign/reassign transaction to convert an international amateur player into an employee, if relevant
custom_steps:
See Approval Updates: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=120636039

Employee Profile Wires: 
http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=employee_profile_-_past_player

Acceptance Criteria:
* If the assign/reassign employee transaction is being done via an international amateur player profile, the approval of this transaction should convert the player into an employee.  
* The employee should have an International tab as well as Info, History, Contract History.

title: As a user I do not want to see Employee Contracts as an option if I don't have the proper permissions
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* If a user does not have a UEC Edit permission, then they should not see "Employee Contract" in the Create New menu for Employees, Pro Players or Dom Ama or Int'l Ama players.

title: As a user I want the approval of an assign/reassign transaction to convert a player into an employee, if relevant
custom_steps:
See Approval Updates: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=120636039

Employee Profile Wires: 
http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=employee_profile_-_past_player

Acceptance Criteria:
* If the assign/reassign employee transaction is being done via a professional player profile, the approval of this transaction should convert the player into an employee.  
* The player's Roster Status should be maintained.

title: Employee Profile - Viewer Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged in with Employee Profile Viewer Permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user attempt to view an Employee Profile anywhere in the system
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view all employee profiles 
BUT user should not be able to make any updates

title: Employee Profile - NO Viewer Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged in WITHOUT Employee Profile Viewer Permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to view Employee Profiles anywhere in the system
custom_expected:
THEN users should only be able to view employees on rosters, widgets, reports, etc
BUT users should not be able to open employee profiles
AND users should not be able to make any updates

title: Employee Profile - Viewer Permissions (CEP)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Club or BOC user is logged in WITHOUT Employee Profile Permissions
BUT logged in user DOES have CSP/CEP Permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to view an employee profile anywhere in the system
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to navigate to the CSP/CEP tab of an employee profile
BUT user should NOT be able to view contracts tab on these profiles
AND user should not be able to make any updates

title: Employee Profile - Edit Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged in with Employee Profile edit permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to an employee profile
custom_expected:
THEN if user has this permission they should see an Edit button on the Employee Profile
 BUT if user does not have this permission they should NOT not see the Edit button

title: Employee Advance Search Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged in with permissions for Employee Advanced Search (Employee advanced search is controlled by the Pro Player Editor/Viewer perms for club and BOC)
custom_steps: When user navigates to advanced search
custom_expected:
THEN user with this permission should be able to view the Employee Search Type 
AND user with this permission should be able to conduct an advance search for Employees
 BUT user without this permission should NOT see Employees as an option under search type

title: As a user I want to see a Create New on the Employee Roster widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC or club user is logged in
AND the user has Employee Transactions or Employee Contracts Admin level permissions
AND the user is in Employee Roster widget
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the Employee Roster widget
custom_expected:
THEN user should see a "Create New button" on the Employee Roster widget.
AND the Create New icon should show for all Orgs for the BOC
BUT the Create New icon should only show the Club's Org when a Club user is viewing the widget. 
AND The create new icon should match what it does from the Employee Profile and be usable.

title: As a User, I want there to be an Address section on an Employee Profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is in Employee Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user opens an employee profile
custom_expected:
THEN there will be an Address section on the employee profile
AND the section will match the provided wireframe and data discovery
AND the section will be editable in edit mode
AND addresses may be added and deleted
AND this section will work the same way it does on player profiles

Wire:
http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=employee_profile

title: As a user I want to see "History" instead of Player History on employee profiles
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged in with permissions for viewing Employee Profile
AND user has opened the profile for an Employee who was NOT a former player
custom_steps: WHEN user views "Player History" table (and "Player History" tab)
custom_expected: THEN "Player History" table (and "Player History" tab) should just read "History".

title: Employee Roster Widget -  Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC or club user is logged in with Employee Transaction Permissions
custom_steps: WHEN the users clicks on Employees
custom_expected:
THEN Users with this permission will be able to navigate to and view the Employee Roster Widget
OR Users without this permission will not see the link to navigate to the Employees Dashboard tab

title: As a user I no longer want to see employees with old positions
custom_preconds:
Positions: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Employee+-+Positions
GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged in with view permissions for Employee Profiles, Transactions, and Contracts
custom_steps: WHEN user views an Employee Profile or Employee Rosters widget
custom_expected:
THEN ALL employees should now have a "new" position and no positions that have been removed should be used
AND the mapping spreadsheet attached to the story, and in the Positions document, should be used to conduct this mapping
AND he employees' assign/reassign transaction and relevant UECs should continue to show the old position information

title: As a BOC Admin, I want an error to fire if a user attempts to select more than 8 coaches for the MJ Roster
custom_steps: WHEN user selects more than 8 coaches
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a rule check that fires on Save
AND IF there are 8 or less coaches select, system will Save
AND IF there are more than 8 coaches, an error message will fire:
  -- Heading: Error
  -- Body: You may only select 8 coaches to appear on the MJ Roster.  You currently have more than that.  Please revise your selections."
  -- Buttons: Back

title: As a BOC Admin I want the MJ Roster widget updated to only show Club specified coaches
custom_steps:
AC:
 - The MJ Roster report will be updated to only show coaches that have been specified by the Club
  -- They will have the flag set in a prior story
 - They may have up to 8 coaches
 - The coaches will continue to appear in alpha order at the bottom of the widget

title: As a BOC Admin, I want the MJ Roster Report Updated to Only Display Club Specified Coaches
custom_steps: WHEN user selects 8 coaches in roster widget
custom_expected:
THEN the MJ ROSTER report will be updated to only show coaches that have been specified by the Club
AND they will have a flag set in a prior story
AND they may have up to 8 coaches
AND the coaches will continue to appear in alpha order on the printed report
AND this will impact the both the report run from the reporting page and the MJ roster widget
AND we should maintain the historical roster reports

title: As a Club Admin, I want to select the 8 coaches that will appear on the MJ Roster Report
custom_preconds: Wire:  [https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=update_roster_report|https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=update_roster_report]
custom_steps: WHEN users navigate to Employee Roster dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN theere will be a new 'Show on Roster' column added to the Employee Roster widget
AND there will be a 'Update Roster Report' button added to the widget
AND clicking the pencil icon put row into edit mode (pencil icon displays only for Major League level)
AND the 'Show On Roster' column into edit mode
AND every Active employee will have a checkbo
AND clicking Save will prompt user to confirm their changes
** If they confirm, their changes will be committed, blue banner displays, and widget will reload in View mode
** If they deny, modal will be dismissed.
AND selecting a coach will set a flag that can be used by reports and widgets
AND snapshots will need to look at this flag

title: As a developer, I want to clean up the logic for displaying employee profiles
As a Club Employee Permission Requests User, I want to see a Prospective Position column on the Employee Permission Requests Widget
custom_steps: Data Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789625/Data+Discovery+-+Permission+Requests+-+ClubAC: - There will be a new 'Prospective Position' column added to the Club version of the Employee Permission Requests widget - The new column will appear after the Requesting Org column - The column will be populated with the value entered into the field of the same name on the respective Permission Request form

title: As an BOC Employee Permission Requests User, I want to see a Prospective Position column on the Employee Permission Requests Widget
custom_steps: Data Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789348/Data+Discovery+-+Permission+Requests+-+BOCAC: - There will be a new 'Prospective Position' column added to the BOC version of the Employee Permission Requests widget - The column will appear after the 'Requesting Org' column - The column will be populated with the value entered in the field of the same name on the respective Permission Request form
